Articles.Content: Since the old one got locked, here's a new one to start discussing about O2010, and I have a poll.

I`v put lots of time into this sim, and lately thanks to KSP I was able to go to the moon and back, and rendevous with the space station. I really hope that Orbiter is not dead and will be updated one day. I really really want to go back to it but it just feels outdated

I use to play it a lot and was part of a dev team that did mods for it. I haven't played it since I discovered KSP version .17. Every so often I'll check out their forum but it just seems to be the same old stuff and people dealing with the same old things for the last few years.
I came here thinking someone made a NEW orbiter.
I don't play it for a while, I think they've stopped working on it.

I enjoyed Orbiter for years, I'm pretty sure since the 2005 version. I did reinstall it recently but it didn't last very long before I deleted it.

I have found I prefer building to flying and you can't build anything in Orbiter, at least not easily.
I can't make heads or tails of it. I gotta sit down and read the book of a manual it has.
